metadata.Title: CVE-2020-10687 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was discovered in all versions of Undertow before Undertow 2.2.0.Final, where HTTP request smuggling related to CVE-2017-2666 is possible against HTTP/1.x and HTTP/2 due to permitting invalid characters in an HTTP request. This flaw allows an attacker to poison a web-cache, perform an XSS attack, or obtain sensitive information from request other than their own.

criterions.comment: undertow package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
